charges.charge_description: 18:371.F CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD THE UNITED STATES; (a) bank robbery in violation of 18:2113 and (b) robbery affecting commerce in violation of 18:1951(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Guilty plea on 2/10/05 as to cnts 1-7, guilty verdict on 2/25/05 as to cnts 8 &; 9. Court sentenced dft to: Cnt 1=60 mos, cnt 8=300 mos, cnt 3=120 mos; cnt 9=300 mos each to run consecutively; cnt 2=240 mos; cnts 4-7=120 mos each to run concurrently w/each other and w/ cnts 1, 2, 3, 8, 9 (total term=780 mos); 3 yrs SR; SA-$900.00; Restitution=$188,678.79. Dft must comply with standard/mandatory conditions of SR upon release from prison. Court recommends participation in 500 hr drug rehab program if eligible. Dft remanded to custody of USM.

charges.charge_disposition: Guilty Plea on 6/16/2005 as to counts 2 and 3 of Superseding Indictment. Incarceraton: ct. 2-76 months; 120 months-ct.3, cts. 2 and 3 to be served consecutively with each other. Total sentence: 196 months. Supervised Release:3 years. Restitution:$107,241.29 to be paid to Kroger. Special Assessment $200.00- Mandatory. Court Recommends in carceration at FCI-Forrest City, AR. All remaining Courts are dismissed. Exhibit 1 marked and admitted to sentencing hearing.
